about.name: Jaeung Kim
about.intro: I'm a frontend developer who enjoys crafting smooth and intuitive user experiences.
about.description1: I love tackling challenges in the development process, the sense of accomplishment from solving problems keeps me motivated and helps me grow.
about.description2: Outside of work, I enjoy playing basketball and spending time in nature on the weekends.
about.description3: This space is my personal playground where I experiment with ideas I’ve been curious about, and also a place to jot down pieces of my everyday life.

introduce.paragraph1: Hello, I’m a frontend developer with {years} of hands on experience building web applications from early planning through to deployment and maintenance. I care about performance, maintainability, and creating interfaces that feel smooth and intuitive.
introduce.paragraph2: I enjoy writing clean code that others can pick up and understand. I regularly explore new tools, libraries, and techniques — adopting what genuinely improves my workflow or enhances the user experience. I’m always learning and striving to grow in both depth and breadth as a developer.
introduce.paragraph3: I’m a Canadian citizen currently living in Korea on an F-4 visa. I’ve worked with people from many different backgrounds and believe strong communication is one of the most important parts of building great products together.

details: Established a reusable frontend template to accelerate development setup across internal projects
Built and maintained a shared design system and component library, improving collaboration with designers via Storybook
Improved initial load time of key products by ~80% through network and rendering optimizations (10s → 2s)
Applied virtualization techniques to enable smooth rendering of large-scale datasets

ndxpro_pmis.title: NDXPRO PMIS
ndxpro_pmis.description: 프로젝트의 일정 및 자원 관리 웹앱.

gantt_chart.title: 간트 차트 (WBS 기반) 개발 및 성능 최적화
subtasks: WBS 기반 Gantt Chart 커스텀 구현 및 Task 의존성(FS/SS/FF/SF) SVG 시각화
간트 바 및 트리 구조 Drag & Drop + Optimistic UI 적용으로 실시간 구조/일정 수정 UX 제공
Virtualization 및 Lazy Loading 기반 트리/도면 뷰 렌더링 최적화 (수천 개 노드 대응)

ndxpro_epc.title: NDXPRO EPC
ndxpro_epc.description: 설계, 조달, 시공 전 과정을 1D·2D·3D 데이터로 통합 시각화하는 웹 솔루션

viewer_markup.title: 2D 도면 뷰어 및 마크업 기능 설계 및 구현
subtasks: SVG 기반 2D Viewer에 확대·축소 및 클릭 이벤트를 연동하여, 도면 내 세부 영역을 탐색 가능하도록 기능 구현
텍스트, 직선, 곡선 등의 마크업 도구 제공, 도면 편집 UI 설계
확대·축소 시에도 마크업 요소의 위치와 비율이 정확하게 유지되도록 SVG 좌표 변환 및 스케일 처리 로직 적용
마크업 요소 생성 및 삭제 기능을 통해 도면 편집 프로세스를 최적화

dashboard_layout.title: 사용자화 가능한 그리드 레이아웃 대시보드 설계 및 구현
subtasks: React Grid Layout 라이브러리를 커스터마이징하여 동적 대시보드 아키텍처를 주도적으로 설계 및 도입
iframe의 postMessage API를 활용하여 협력 업체와의 3D Viewer를 연동하고 원활한 데이터 통신 기능 구현

ndxpro_admin_web.title: NDXPRO ADMIN WEB
ndxpro_admin_web.description: NGSI-LD 기반 디지털 트윈 데이터를 정제하고 모델링·운영하는 NDXPRO 핵심 플랫폼

data_manager.title: Data Manager V3 기능 개발 및 고도화
subtasks: 디지털 트윈 NGSI-LD 표준 데이터 모델 기반의 Attribute, Data Model, Relationship 생성 및 관리 기능 담당
React Flow를 활용하여 데이터 모델과 관계를 직관적으로 시각화하고, 사용자 중심의 데이터 모델링 환경 제공
Excel Import/Export 기능을 구현하여 대규모 데이터를 효율적으로 일괄 등록 및 다운로드할 수 있도록 지원
Excel 업로드 시 Client 측 유효성 검사를 적용하고, 각 셀 및 행의 오류를 UI에 시각화하여 사용자 편의성 개선

user_auth.title: 인증 및 사용자 관리 기능 개선
subtasks: 기존 로그인 및 회원가입 기능의 레거시 코드를 전면 리팩토링하여 인증 프로세스 안정성 및 유지보수성 향상
Axios Interceptor를 통한 인증 세션 관리 및 토큰 자동 갱신 프로세스를 최적화하여 사용자 세션 안정성 강화

samsung_thync.title: Samsung Thync
samsung_thync.description: 상일동 삼성물산 BEMS 시스템의 Unreal 앱 내 사용자·자산 관리를 위한 웹뷰 기반의 관리 시스템

viewer_markup.title: 2D Drawing Viewer & Markup Tools
subtasks: Implemented an SVG-based 2D viewer with zoom and interaction capabilities for exploring complex drawings
Built markup tools (text, lines, curves) and interactions for editing within the viewer
Applied precise SVG coordinate scaling to maintain markup element positioning during zooming
Streamlined the drawing editing workflow with create/delete markup interactions

dashboard_layout.title: Customizable Dashboard with Grid Layout
subtasks: Led the integration of a dynamic dashboard system using a customized React Grid Layout
Enabled seamless communication between embedded 3D viewer and main app using postMessage API

details: Joined as the first developer and led the end-to-end planning, development, deployment, and maintenance of all frontend services for a unified clothing marketplace startup
Built a robust E-Commerce platform with seamless integration of multiple Shopify marketplaces
Improved user authentication and security through integration with Supabase and third-party login providers (Instagram, TikTok, etc.)
Integrated Shopify Payments to reduce cart abandonment and increase successful transactions
Set up a scalable cloud environment using AWS and Fly.io
Contributed to early revenue generation by enabling rapid onboarding and supporting a successful soft launch
Developed a full marketing microsite using WebGL to deliver a modern, interactive web experience
Built immersive UI interactions with Framer Motion and GSAP, enhancing user engagement
Designed and maintained an internal admin portal for workforce and attendance management, accessible to non-technical stakeholders
Managed AWS infrastructure, backend services, NoSQL data modeling, and server deployments
Developed and maintained RESTful APIs with full CRUD capabilities for client-facing applications
Implemented automated email workflows using AWS SES and Node.js within an Angular-based admin dashboard
Deployed backend services using NGINX with zero-downtime strategies
Applied Google Analytics to analyze and improve user engagement
Set up CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions for reliable and efficient deployments
Integrated multiple third-party systems to enable credit card purchases of cryptocurrencies
Migrated REST APIs to GraphQL using Apollo, significantly improving app performance and flexibility
Built a social sharing preview feature using AWS Lambda@Edge and Facebook Open Graph
Collaborated closely with designers to improve the overall user experience and interface design

react-gantt-chart.title: React Gantt Chart
description: Open-source alternative to paid or inflexible Gantt chart solutions
Lightweight, extensible design for personal and professional use
Continuously improved based on community feedback

portfolio-website.title: Portfolio Website
description: Centralizes personal projects and articles in one place
Incorporates latest trends in frontend development with fully responsive experience
Prioritizes intuitive structure, clean design, and performance optimization

bc-government.title: BC Government
description: Created for the BC government’s IS24 Full Stack Competition
Offers a user-friendly interface for managing employees and teams
Built with a full-stack approach and deployed via Docker

lostark-bot.title: Lost Ark Discord Bot
description: Simplifies party and raid recruitment on Discord
Allows quick party creation and management through simple commands
Enhanced and maintained with community feedback

webgl-playground.title: WebGL Playground
description: Experimental 3D interaction project for the web
Features 3D scenes responsive to user input and various visual effects

lental.title: Lental
description: Housing search platform for UBC students
Developed as a capstone project to tackle off-campus housing challenges
Supports student-listed properties with an intuitive UI and filtering
